segments.text: I see the entire kitchen layout in this illustration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands drying a plate, towel bunched up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbeknownst to her, the sink is overflowing wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle expands on the floor, soaking her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She remains calm, focused solely on her chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the upper cabinet hangs open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy perches on the tilting stool, hand in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies tempt him, and he's grabbing as many as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl assists by waiting with open hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This sneaky operation could end in a painful fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Slippery tiles from the water make it worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The view through the window is of a neat garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame the inside doesn't match that serenity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel disgusted by the carelessness all around.
segments.speaker: PAR
